revisions.rev:
{{Infobox tvseason | image = | season_name = Casualty'' series 19 | show_name = ''[[Casualty (TV series)|Casualty]]'' | bgcolour = #664400 | fgcolour = #ffffff | dvd_release_date = Unknown | country = [[United Kingdom]] | network = [[BBC]] | first_aired = {{Start date|2004|9|11|df=y}} | last_aired = {{End date|2005|8|20|df=y}} | num_episodes = 47 | prev_series = [[Casualty (series 18)|18]] | next_series = [[Casualty (series 20)|20]] }} The nineteenth series of the [[United Kingdom|British]] [[medical drama]] [[television series]] ''[[Casualty (TV series)|Casualty]]'' commenced airing in the United Kingdom on BBC One on 11 September 2004 and finished on 20 August 2005.[http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0096555/episodes#season-19 IMDb ''Casualty'' Series 19] It saw another increase, this time to 47 episodes. For the Christmas episodes of the series, two cross-over episodes with ''[[Holby City]]'' were shown, titled as: "[[Casualty@Holby City]]".
==Cast== *[[Simon MacCorkindale]] as Harry Harper *[[Liz Carling]] as Selena Manning (Episode 1 onwards) *[[Maxwell Caulfield]] as Jim Brodie (Episodes 1-17) *[[Susan Cookson]] as Maggie Coldwell (Episode 21 onwards) *[[Suzanne Packer]] as Tess Bateman *[[Derek Thompson (actor)|Derek Thompson]] as Charlie Fairhead (Episode 18-47) *[[Ian Bleasdale]] as Josh Griffiths *[[James Redmond (actor)|James Redmond]] as John "Abs" Denham *[[Georgina Bouzova]] as Ellen Zitek (Episodes 3-25 and Episode 42 onwards) *[[Martina Laird]] as Comfort Newton *[[Kwame Kwei-Armah]] as Finlay "Fin" Newton (Episodes 3-5) *[[Rebekah Gibbs]] as Nina Farr *[[Matthew Wait]] as Luke Warren *[[Will Thorp]] as Paul "Woody" Joyner *[[Elyes Gabel]] as Gurpreet "Guppy" Sandhu (Episode 8 onwards) *[[Luke Bailey (actor)|Luke Bailey]] as Sam Bateman (Episode 5 onwards) *[[Loo Brealey]] as Roxanne Bird (Episodes 1-3) *[[Leanne Wilson]] as Claire Guildford (Episodes 1-47) *[[Sarah Manners]] as Rebecca "Bex" Reynolds (Episodes 1-44) *[[Janine Mellor]] as Kelsey Phillips (Episode 45 onwards) *[[Adam James (actor)|Adam James]] as Peter Guildford (Episodes 19-42) ==Notable guest characters== *[[Gary Mavers]] as Will Manning *[[Julia Hills]] as Caroline Miller *[[Madhav Sharma]] as Jas Sandhu *[[Irma Innis]] as Ruth Abbott *[[Cassie Raine]] as Kate Millar *[[Louis Emerick]] as Mike Bateman *[[Laura Donnelly]] as Fleur Butler ==Episodes== {{Main|List of Casualty episodes}} {| class="wikitable" style="width:100%;" |- !
